sitechanges.name: Changes Extraction
sitechanges.description:
This extraction shows the changes for the reported sites and stores them in an excel file for each of the different countries. 
Click on the "Generate new" button to generate a new extraction or click on the "Download" button to download the last generated extraction.

releases.name: Union Lists
releases.description:
There are 9 biogeographical regions (the Union lists) and 5 marine biogeographical regions. 
The Union lists data for a site are: the biogeographical region, code, name, priority, SDF area, length, centre coordinates. 
The tool shows SCI sites affected by a change (changes related to a marine biogeographical region are not reported). 
SCI with no-change with respect to the Union lists data are not shown. 

To download data: 
• Download Updated Union lists: download the Union lists where a change was detected 
• Download Union lists: download the 9 Union lists

reports.name: Releases Dates Overview
reports.description: An overview by release of the number of sites for each of the different releases dates.

reports.name: Releases Dates
reports.description: List of the sites with each release date by release.

reports.name: Reference Sites Details
reports.description: Sites details for the reference data.

reports.name: Sites Status
reports.description:
Shows status (accepted, rejected, no change detected), for all sites in the database. 
Important: when sharing with Member States, remove the columns “Justification missing”, “Comments” and “Documents”.

reports.name: Sites Bioregions
reports.description: Matrix of sites with the bioregions grouped in terrestrial and marine for the reported data.

reports.name: SCIs w/o UL Regions
reports.description: List of SCI sites (type B and C) without a terrestrial bioregion for the reported data.

reports.name: Manual Updates
reports.description: List of sites with information about manual edition, comments and documents by release.

reports.name: Union Lists Changes
reports.description: List of sites with each biogeographical region for the reported data.
